mapper.select: select ni.noti_code, nt.notit_name, ni.noti_content from noti_info ni, noti_type nt where ni.notit_code=nt.notit_code and ni.s_id=#{sId} order by notim_date desc, notir_date desc
select g_code, g_spname from goods where s_id=#{sId} order by g_date desc
select * from goods g, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cmm, cate_main cm where g.cates_code=cs.cates_code and cs.catemm_code=cmm.catemm_code and cmm.catem_code=cm.catem_code and g_code=#{g_code}
select g_spname as g_img from goods where g_code=#{g_code} union all select gs_spname as g_img from goods_sub where g_code=#{g_code}
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo(o_code, m_id, s_id, o_content, o_date) values (o_code_sqn.nextval, #{m_id}, #{s_id}, #{o_content}, sysdate)
